attributes.action: inforce a stricter  policy for all hospitality staff who work more than a 40 hour week without being paid overtime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: chefs waiters receptionists infact anyone working in the hospitality industry in the UK. we all work unsocialable hours and the majority of us only get paid for the first forty hours we work,regardless of the eighty hours we actually do per week. surely our great british goverment should be doing something about this by now. by implenting stricter working and pay related paramiters within this trade and actually protect our rights to fair pay. also when you work out the actual pay of most employee's within this trade who average a 60 hour week you'll find they earn below minimum wage.
